body.p:
Move the Reactor off its pallet with a forklift as follows:
The Current-Limiting Reactor or its Side Car is bolted to a pallet. With the pallet resting on the floor, remove the bolts.
Insert forklift forks under the Current-Limiting Reactor Cabinet or optional Side Car from any side.
Move each unit to its installation location and withdraw the forklift. Units have no casters and should be precisely positioned with the forklift. Current-Limiting Reactor Dimensions and Weight
